+		description = "The order in which to sort the timers",

nodes.bodyText: I think that this is a bit hard to read, can you un-nest this ternary?
Now that it's using Units the name Timer Warning (Seconds) feels redundant, consider renaming the option and corresponding fields to something like Timer Warning Threshold or similar

nodes.bodyText: I think this can just be removed?
No idea how I missed that.
